name: DODGE IT (Beta)
description:
A Game I made for  My first game jam 2023.

Endless dodging game prototype made in godot.

Currently in beta, highscore system is WIP.

Critics and Opinions are highly appreciated !

Donations are not required but would be very appreciated!

Music by Kevin Macleod.

How to play:

Spam the [W] key to flap or fly or idk what it's called tbh

Use the [A] and [D] keys to move

Things marked in red are bad
